messages.subject: Re:  Oh No!!
messages.msgSnippet: Andrea and Kelley, As the one who started this topic, I have no problem with where you all have gone.  I mean, talk about an awesome example of unschooling!
messages.messageBody:
Andrea and Kelley,

As the one who started this topic, I have no problem
with where you all have gone. I mean, talk about an
awesome example of unschooling! We started with one
area that led to another and you both are very very
inspiring. The joy you have for what you do, shines
through.

I was in the Navy for four years and I never LOVED it
like you two LOVE what you do. Two women who LOVE
dogs, making a living from it, continuing things on
the side that they enjoy, AND unschooling their
children? Wow, this is truly an amazing and talented
group. :-)



Happy Learning,
~Sandy
www.360.yahoo.com/aplan4life
